casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
CARLOS P. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 5, 2017

Pamela S. Nagy, assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 530, 157 A.3d 723 (2017), is denied.
